channel.title: Aggressive-Action on Fen TTRPG
channel.description: Recent content in Aggressive-Action on Fen TTRPG

item.title: Load
item.description:
1 aggressive action

You load ammunition into a weapon with the Loaded weapon trait. The number of ammunition loaded into the weapon is specified by its Loaded trait.
item.content:
1 aggressive action

You load ammunition into a weapon with the Loaded weapon trait. The number of ammunition loaded into the weapon is specified by its Loaded trait.
